content: bit better if it is included finishing fold round 12 under and sew the first free loop of round 9 to the first free loop of 11 note i put the needle under the free loop on round 9 and up through the matching free loop on round 11 as i go around i keep tucking round 12 under to the inside continue around the doily with all 96 stitches weave in the ends throw it and have fun
